org.hatemile.util

Class CommonFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hatemile.util.CommonFunctions

  • public final class CommonFunctions
extends Object
    The CommonFuncionts class contains the used methods by HaTeMiLe classes.

      The name of attribute for not modify the elements.

        public static void setListAttributes(HTMLDOMElement element1,
                                     HTMLDOMElement element2,
                                     String[] attributes)
        Copy a list of attributes of a element for other element.
        Parameters:
        element1 - The element that have attributes copied.
        element2 - The element that copy the attributes.
        attributes - The list of attributes that will be copied.

      • increaseInList

        public static String increaseInList(String list,
                                    String stringToIncrease)
        Increase a item in a HTML list.
        Parameters:
        list - The list.
        stringToIncrease - The value of item.
        Returns:
        The HTML list with the item added, if the item not was contained in list.

      • inList

        public static boolean inList(String list,
                             String stringToSearch)
        Verify if the list contains the item.
        Parameters:
        list - The list.
        stringToSearch - The value of item.
        Returns:
        True if the list contains the item or false is not contains.

      • isValidElement

        public static boolean isValidElement(HTMLDOMElement element)
        Check that the element can be manipulated by HaTeMiLe.
        Parameters:
        element - The element
        Returns:
        True if element can be manipulated or false if element cannot be manipulated.
